Thank you
On Jul 31, 2019, at 3:12 PM wrote:
Hi
One more correction - it is generally psychology staff, in connection with medical staff, who determine whether an inmate's suicidal gesture is sincere or done for manipulation purposes.
Thanks,
Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, NY 10007
